column4: Quick question: i just installed edubuntu merely for the purpose of seeing what it was but now i realized i dont want it at all. i tried doing a sudo apt-get remove command but when i rebooted edubuntu was still on the startup screen what do i need to do?
you must change the splash screen
you mean it's the splash screen that has changed, edubuntu is just a set of packages added to ubuntu
right thats what i wanted gone
